name: Tango2
summary: A Tango based colour theme for Vim (ported from gedit)
description:
This is a colour scheme based on the tango colour palette. 

A screenshot can be found at
   http://www.cse.iitm.ac.in/~spranesh/tango2/vim.html
install_details:
Put tango2.vim

in $VIM/colors/

and restart vim
